items.sentence: I'm usually pretty good with faces, but I didn't recognize him at all.

I'll be able to see you tomorrow unless something unexpected turns up.
How did you find out that Tom was the one who had eaten your sandwich?
Tom and Mary were in the same class when they were in the third grade.
Which of the languages that you know was the hardest for you to learn?
The whole point of wearing a mask is to protect the people around you.
Tom stayed in Boston for three months before he was transferred again.
Tom was killed by the husband of the woman he'd been hanging out with.
There were several young children swimming naked in the shallow river.
The twin girls are so much alike that I can\'t tell one from the other.
I still haven\'t thanked you for the other day. I really appreciate it.
Why don\'t you do us all a favor and go back to wherever you came from?

I came over here to tell you guys that you need to be a little quieter.
If I remember correctly, Tom sold his car to Mary for just 500 dollars.
My brother Tom is older than me, but all my other brothers are younger.
